title: Z390
author: Z390
content: Have anyone went deep into the Optimism coin? What do you think about this second layer blockchain project? A good one or not worth it? The billion supply for 1.2$ from a new coin seem to high in this bear market, what do you think ?

comments.author: RussianEnglishTranslation
comments.body: Quote from: Z390 on June 06, 2022, 06:37:26 AMHave anyone went deep into the Optimism coin? What do you think about this second layer blockchain project? A good one or not worth it? The billion supply for 1.2$ from a new coin seem to high in this bear market, what do you think ?The token really serves no purpose right now. Additionally, the future of WEB3 is not L2, it's scalable L1s like NEAR and Candle Chain. L2 blockchains can have high gas fees due to being on Ethereum and the time to go off of the L2 to Ethereum can take a week. You don't have those problems with sidechains. In fact, NEAR has the only 1000 trustless Ethereum bridge and CNDL has 2 second transaction and 0 fees.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: This is a serious project, not just another add-on to Ethereum, although the airdrop is not very happy. The advantage of this project is of course the cost and speed of its transactions, but so far not such a wide area of application, waiting for Ethereum 2.0, perhaps after the merger something will change and commissions will become even cheaper and the speed even faster.As for the price, the fall by 75% was caused by airdrop, but I think that the price can easily return to these values. I did not sell my tokens because I did not manage to catch a high price, and there is not much sense to dump like all of them, I will wait in the medium or long term, the price may grow after consolidation, if it goes lower, I will buy some more to my portfolio.

comments.author: el kaka22
comments.body: I have checked it after seeing it here a few times, and I have to say it doesn't really bring in any new features that would make it unique enough to go up too much. Don't get me wrong, it is not a bad one, it just doesn't really capture anything new for the market. This is why I believe that we should not really be making a big deal out of this at all.I get that we are going to end up with some coins that will be brand new and then take the place of the old ones, all the top 10 ones right now aside from 3-4 of them will be replaced one day, and that is what people are looking for, the ones that will replace, but optimism doesn't look like that one.
